title: How to Send Money from Apple Pay to Cash App: Step-by-Step Method

steps.title: Open the Wallet app on your iPhone.
steps.content: Open the Wallet app on your iPhone. You can’t directly transfer money from Apple Pay to Cash App, but you can use Apple Pay to send the money to your bank. Once the money is in your bank account, you can easily transfer it to Cash App. For more information, check out our guide on using Wallet on iPhone . If you're using an iPad, open the Settings app and select Wallet & Apple Pay instead. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the options button (iPhone only).
steps.content: Tap the options button (iPhone only). It’s three horizontal dots inside of a circle. You can skip this step if you're using an iPad.

steps.title: Tap Transfer to Bank.
steps.content: Tap Transfer to Bank . It has an arrow pointing to the right.

steps.title: Enter an amount and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter an amount and tap Next . Type the amount that you want to send to your Cash App balance.

steps.title: Tap 1-3 Business Days.
steps.content: Tap 1-3 Business Days . You can add a bank account at this step if you don’t have one connected yet.

steps.title: Tap Transfer and confirm the transfer.
steps.content: Tap Transfer and confirm the transfer. You’ll be asked to input your passcode, Touch ID, or Face ID. The transferred balance will appear in your bank account in 1 to 3 days. After the balance transfer successfully, you can move to the next step to transfer the money into Cash App.

steps.title: Open Cash App on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open Cash App on your iPhone or iPad. Now that the Apple Pay balance has been transferred to your bank account, you can add the amount to your Cash App account. [2] X Research source If you haven't connected your bank account to Cash App, you can deposit money at a participating retailer . You can change your Cash App PIN or password if needed.

steps.title: Tap the money tab button.
steps.content: Tap the money tab button. This is at the bottom of the Cash App home page.

steps.title: Type in the amount you want to transfer.
steps.content: Type in the amount you want to transfer. This should be the amount you transferred from your Apple Pay to your bank account.

steps.title: Tap Add and confirm the transfer.
steps.content: Tap Add and confirm the transfer. You’ll need to input your PIN or Touch ID to confirm the transfer from your bank to Cash App. Did you know you can deposit a check on Cash App ?
